Class SentimentRanker

java.lang.Object
Articles.SentimentRanker
public class SentimentRanker extends Object
This class is responsible for ranking the sentiment of an article based on a lexicon of words with associated sentiment values.

    • readLexiconWords

      public void readLexiconWords() throws Exception
      Reads the lexicon words from Lexicon.txt
      Throws:
      Exception - - If the file cannot be read or if the file does not exist

    • parseLexiconWords

      public void parseLexiconWords()
      Parses the lexicon words into LexiconWord objects using the LexiconWord class's split method

    • rank

      public float rank() throws Exception
      Ranks the sentiment of the article based on the lexicon words
      Returns:
      The sentiment rank of the article
      Throws:
      Exception - - If the lexicon words cannot be read or if the lexicon words file does not exist
